title: My API Keys

info.line1: On this page, you can view and manage all your saved API keys.
info.line2: Never share your API keys on any public platform or browser.
info.line3: Make sure to enable read and trade permissions on your API key to verify and run bots on your crypto account.
info.line4: Ensure your API key is active and valid for your bot to function correctly.
info.line5: Check your exchange API limits — too many requests may result in restrictions.

empty: No API keys have been added yet.
